document_data.caption: A map showing the Tower of Nephthys (labeled #22) in the City of the Gods.
document_data.name: Tower of Nephthys
document_data.location: [[Skuld/City of the Gods|City of the Gods]], [[Skuld]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tower of Nephthys''' was a sacred tower located in the capital city of [[Skuld]] in [[Mulhorand]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|490 Skuld}}
document_data.Location: The Tower was located in the northern central part of the [[Skuld/City of the Gods|City of the Gods]] in the northern central part of the city. It sat just north of the grand [[Pyramid of Re]].
document_data.History: The Tower of Nephthys served as a home for the [[incarnation]] of [[Nephthys]], the [[Mulhorandi pantheon|Mulhorandi]] protector of the dead. The Tower of Nephthys was built by slaves and was thousands of years old as of the {{YearlinkName|1357}}.
